body:
Enjoyed it LOL! Artwork pretty good LOL! Censoring TOTALLY unnecessary - as usual LOL! But what the F*CK is up with all those goddam LOLs! LOL!







1

Yep. Definitely not NTR since they're technically not together. BUT HOLY FUCKING SHIT THERE'S A LOT OF LOLS. Literally every single speech bubble had one. I know the artist likes to add "草" or "w" but translator please it's okay to omit it.
They're just childhood friends, not lovers. So this isn't NTR. Your crush loves somebody else, not u, doesn't mean that you got NTRed.
soo... why doesnt he just ask to fuck her? it seems like literally everyone else is. also stop with the LOLs already ffs
I swear, nobody knows what NTR is. This ain't it.
Is it useless to hope for part 2 to have a happy ending instead?

haha it's quite funny when the guy only watching n get boner. 

he can get the girl pussy n all the money he want from all of them so stupid. he just abandon the easy money.
Please stop with the Lols I am dying why the fuck is their too many Lols please help I am having a fucking stroke. TOO MANY FUCKING LOLS FOR FUCK SAKE
Carnivorous indeed.Lmao the simp is such a laughing stock 🤣🤣
this aint netorare , this is sad
This gotta be a fucking joke. Almost all of the dialogue has "lol" in it, it sounds so forced.
The scene when he was peeping on them on his knees got me laughing hard ';p i can't understand how can anyone get horny from this
